thread.section_title: The Union Democrat, Sonora, CA News, Sports, & Weather
thread.title: Weekend fire destroys Groveland-area home

title: Weekend fire destroys Groveland-area home
text: Weekend fire destroys Groveland-area home Weekend fire destroys Groveland-area home By Jason Cowan, The Union Democrat October 13, 2015 01:00 am A fire destroyed a home in the Pine Mountain Lake subdivision near Groveland early Saturday morning, according to Cal Fire personnel in Groveland. The fire began at 3 a.m. and was contained by noon. The fire was fought by resources from Jamestown, Groveland Fire, Coulterville Cal Fire and Cal Fire in Tuolumne County. Cal Fire said no injuries were reported and the cause was undetermined. Follow UnionDemocrat.com
